Title: Two Is a Family
Writer: Eugenio Derbez (based upon the feature film "Instructions Not Included" directed by), Eugenio Derbez (based upon the feature film written by), Hugo Gélin (dialogue), Hugo Gélin (screenplay), Igor Gotesman (collaboration), Guillermo Ríos (original screenplay), Jean-André Yerlès (dialogue), Jean-André Yerlès (screenplay), Mathieu Oullion (dialogue), Mathieu Oullion (screenplay), Leticia López Margalli (original screenplay)
Actors: Omar Sy, Clémence Poésy, Antoine Bertrand, Ashley Walters
Plot: A bachelor enjoys his sweet life on the French Riviera until a one-night stand tells him, he's dad to Gloria and leaves her with him. He moves to London with Gloria. Mom turns up 8 years later.
